items.name: Rollo
items.description: The wise all-seeing eye of Moonbounce.

items.name: Devo
items.description: The friendliest demon from the deep dark circles of Moonbounce.

items.name: Pengu
items.description: This flightless bird is a master of waddling across the internet.

items.name: Empty Bottle
items.description: An empty bottle. Looks boring right now,  but soon you’ll be able to use it to craft potions,  dyes,  and more!

items.name: Two Blue Coins
items.description: This looks an awful lot like two gold coins,  but it may be worth a lot more or maybe even less later on.

items.name: Two Gold Coins
items.description: Well it’s not a lot,  but hey at least it’s something!

items.name: White Fabric
items.description: Now all you need to find is some sewing tools and you’ll be on your way to crafting the next hottest pixel fit on the internet!

items.name: Wizard Hat
items.description: An ancient relic of a long-forgotten sorcery art. It will not give you magical abilities,  but it will give you the ability to look like you have some.

items.name: Smooth Silk
items.description: I guess this comes from a silkworm?

items.name: Uncut Nebula
items.description: We think this could look really cool,  but its too early to tell

items.name: Nebula Orb
items.description: It’s emitting an interesting and chaotic aura

items.name: Crumpled Metal
items.description: Something smashed this thing to pieces!

items.name: Green Gem
items.description: Green like the grass you don’t touch.

items.name: Slightly Magical Fruit
items.description: Enjoy it when you're feeling like a wizard who's having an off day.

items.name: Minor Magic Potion
items.description: You can kinda feel something special about this potion,  but its not much.

items.name: Stardust
items.description: It fell right out of the sky!

items.name: Starlight Alloy
items.description: We've brewed this bad boy with stardust,  moonbeams,  and a dash of pure "because we can.”

items.name: Plain Milk Carton
items.description: Your dependable,  uneventful companion in the multiplayer internet,  because sometimes,  life needs a little less excitement.

items.name: Craftsman Blade
items.description: No,  it won't magically make crafting a breeze,  but it comes pretty close.

items.name: Sewing Needle
items.description: Perfect for sewing tons of items together.

items.name: Haunted Bone
items.description: When this ghostly relic makes its way into your cauldron,  it brings a certain spooky je ne sais quoi to the mix.

items.name: Witch's Cauldron
items.description: Dive into the world of alchemy with a cauldron that can't resist a good stir.

items.name: Skull Potion
items.description: Be cautious; its effects might come with a few ghostly surprises!

items.name: Shadow Essence
items.description: When added to a cauldron,  the liquid should shimmer with a dark,  mysterious energy.

items.name: Old Thread
items.description: Ah,  the humble Old Thread. It may not look like much at first glance,  but this unassuming spool of thread has a history,  we just never felt like looking into it.

items.name: Puff
items.description: Ghostly grin,  zero scares. A see-through buddy bringing laughs,  not shivers. Spookiness? Nah,  just playful antics. Levitating things,  ghost-style.

items.name: Star Sickle
items.description: Crafted from a rare starlight alloy,  some say that crops harvested with the Star Sickle have a faint twinkle to them.

items.name: Turtle Shell
items.description: The ultimate symbol of a gaming era when jumping on enemies' heads was the height of heroism.

items.name: Purple Gem
items.description: A dark aura seems to surround this gem

items.name: Olive
items.description: King of the salt,  always has something to say at the family function

items.name: Gold Bow
items.description: Like the color of the sunrise,  so cute!

items.name: Pink Bow
items.description: Look at it! How precious!

items.name: Purple Top Hat
items.description: *tips hat* “good day”

items.name: Green Top Hat
items.description: I think a leprechaun misplaced something…

items.name: Red Space Mask
items.description: You might need this if you want to go on a morning spacewalk around the web.

items.name: Blue Space Mask
items.description: You might need this if you want to go on a morning spacewalk around the web.

items.name: Polished Red Gem
items.description: A red gem cut into a near perfect circle. Shiny!

items.name: Polished Blue Gem
items.description: A blue gem cut into a near perfect circle. Shiny!

items.name: Hammer
items.description: *clink* *clink* *CLUNK*

items.name: Fairy Particles
items.description: Rumor has it that this pinch of sparkly dust originates from an enchanted etherworld. Or they could just be glitter flakes that got loose from the unicorn craze back in the 2010s.

items.name: Carrot
items.description: Just a typical digital veggie,  unless the glitches get out of hand when networks start self-identifying as root systems...then just unplug the internet and try chomping your way out.

items.name: Branch
items.description: Talk about a weird wood wide web! Just remember - the developers who planted this seed aren’t liable for any forests spontaneously generated…

items.name: Tiny Crown
items.description: For when you're feeling royally adorable – a crown fit for a mini monarch.

items.name: Crown
items.description: Rule the virtual kingdom in regal splendor with this majestic crown.

items.name: Tiny Tiara
items.description: A petite tiara for the big moments – because even tiny celebrations deserve a touch of sparkle.

items.name: Purple Party Hat
items.description: Purple reigns supreme in the party kingdom – your ticket to a regal celebration!

items.name: Blue Party Hat
items.description: Dive into the blue wave of celebration – this hat is your passport to a party paradise.

items.name: Red Party Hat
items.description: Paint the town red with this festive party hat – because every celebration needs a bold hue.

items.name: Elite Party Hat
items.description: For the party elite – this hat guarantees VIP status at every celebration.

items.name: Star Hat
items.description: Wear the galaxy on your head – because every star deserves a moment in the spotlight.

items.name: Halo Hat
items.description: When a halo meets a hoop – a hat that's as heavenly as it is trendy.

items.name: Bowler Hat
items.description: a timeless accessory for every celebration,  big or small!

items.name: Antenna Hat
items.description: Keep your connection strong to the good times with this antennae-topped hat – a signal that the party is always on!

items.name: Flying Saucer
items.description: Embark on a whimsical journey with this UFO hat – ready to lift your spirits to new heights of fun and imagination!

items.name: Minicorn Horn
items.description: Unleash your inner magic with this enchanting minicorn horn – every day is an opportunity for fantastical moments!

items.name: Mr. Man
items.description: He's just a little guy.. or so we think

items.name: Bumpy
items.description: Bumpy rough on edges. Bumpy not know much. Bumpy like MP.

items.name: Yin Yang
items.description: It's all about balance,  and that's just a part of life!

items.name: Anatomical Heart
items.description: When we said you steal everyone's hearts away,  we didn't mean it literally

items.name: Black Kitten Ears
items.description: These tiny black kitten ears were taken right off of a cute kitten.

items.name: Orange Kitten Ears
items.description: Wearing these orange kitten ears,  youre guaranteed to have the shared braincell 1% of the time!

items.name: Lavender Wizard Hat
items.description: An elegant wizard hat,  in a dashing lavender scheme!

items.name: Lunar Trucker
items.description: Cruise through pixelated craters and celestial sights,  transporting yourself to realms beyond imagination.

items.name: Holy Trucker
items.description: Have a roadmap to adventure etched onto your character’s style,  guiding you through every pixelated journey.

items.name: Sprout Trucker
items.description: Bring a garden party on wheels,  spreading joy wherever your pixels roam.

items.name: Blue Bonnet
items.description: Slap on the Blue Bonnet and join the garden gang! It adds a pop of color to your virtual vibe without getting your hands dirty.

items.name: Purple Bonnet
items.description: Sport the Purple Bonnet and level up your floral fashion game!

items.name: Red Bonnet
items.description: Strut your stuff and let your character bloom brighter than ever!

items.name: Flower Crown
items.description: Adds a sprinkle of spring to your characters's look,  making every day feel like a festival.

items.name: 3-D Glasses
items.description: It's a bit ironic,  isn't it?

items.name: Hard Hat
items.description: Get ready to rock the virtual construction zone and become the ultimate pixel builder.

items.name: Bonnet Sprout
items.description: Rock the Bonnet Sprout and watch your character's style game blossom!

items.name: Blue Flower Pot
items.description: A splash of cool blue vibes that add to your pixel paradise

items.name: Purple Flower Pot
items.description: Elevate your accessory game to VIP status with this royal purple flower!

items.name: Red Flower Pot
items.description: Adds a fiery touch to your pixel head,  making you the hottest spot in town.

items.name: Fertilizer
items.description: The secret sauce for pixel plant success

items.name: Garden Pot
items.description: Say hello to your virtual green thumb's best friend.

items.name: Garden Shovel
items.description: Dig up some dirt and get in there!

items.name: Watering Can
items.description: The low-key MVP of the gardening world,  helping you keep those pixel plants thriving with minimal effort.

items.name: Iron Plate
items.description: Add a touch of industrial chic to your virtual creations,  turning pixels into powerhouse designs.

items.name: Vinyl Sheet
items.description: Just your average vinyl material,  nothing to write home about.

items.name: Prismatic Dust
items.description: Infuse your pixel projects with rainbow magic,  turning dull into dazzling.

items.name: Red Lens
items.description: View the virtual world through rose-tinted pixels

items.name: Blue Lens
items.description: Dive into a sea of virtual blues

items.name: Gold Orb
items.description: You Just struck pixel gold,  turning your pixel dreams into reality

items.name: Strange Cloth
items.description: Its super soft,  but in the weirdest way possible?

items.name: Electricity
items.description: Energize your digital domain,  powering up your pixel creations with ease.

items.name: LED Lights
items.description: Illuminate your virtual world with LED Lights! Turn your pixel palace into a disco party.

items.name: Circuit
items.description: Get powered up with the Circuit! Add an electric buzz to your virtual toolkit,  sparking creativity with every connection.

items.name: Four Leaf Clover
items.description: A rare clover we picked out from a big wide open patch of flowers,  fit with lucky soil through and through

items.name: Lucky Fungus
items.description: We found this on a log on the way to a pot of gold.

items.name: Wooden Spoon
items.description: It's a wooden spoon. You probably already know what to do with it - stir things.

items.name: Josh's Support Tincture
items.description: Hmm… looks like drinking this potion will get Josh Isn’t Gaming to show me some love in his next video

items.name: Josh's Discord Brew
items.description: Hmm.. looks like drinking this potion will give me a role in the Josh Isn’t Gaming Discord server

items.name: Empty Potion Bottle
items.description: To hold all your potion endeavors

items.name: Twisted Pengu Collectible
items.description: Found it on the floor beneath some grimy herbs in some druid’s barber shop

items.name: Brown Wizard Hat
items.description: A pretty cool wizard hat,  and it’s a bit brown. Wait.. did someone leave chocolate in the wash?

items.name: Orange Wizard Hat
items.description: A pretty cool wizard hat,  kind of smells like carrots

items.name: Creme De Wizard Hat
items.description: This creamy headwear is like the fine dining of wizard hats. It’s the kind of hat that says “I cast spells,  but I also appreciate a good soufflé.”

items.name: OG Wizzy Hat
items.description: Ahh,  the nostalgia

items.name: Mithril Helmet
items.description: Straight from a realm where the grind is real and “buying gf” is a legitimate currency,  the Mithril Helm is the perfect addition to any inventory.

items.name: Steel Med
items.description: If anyone asks where you got it,  just give them a knowing smile and say "I'd tell you,  but then I'd have to PK you." They'll understand.

items.name: Beaver Plushie
items.description: Ethically sourced beavers only. We’re not monsters

items.name: Solar Overhead
items.description: Soak up the virtual sunshine and make every pixel day feel like a bright new beginning.

items.name: Lunar Overhead
items.description: Makes every pixel moonlit stroll feel like a cosmic adventure

items.name: Rose Wizard Hat
items.description: An elegant wizard hat,  in a dashing rosy color scheme!

items.name: Green Wizard Hat
items.description: An elegant wizard hat,  in a dashing green color scheme!

items.name: Fuchsia Wizard Hat
items.description: An elegant wizard hat,  in a dashing fuchsia color scheme!

items.name: Amber Wizard Hat
items.description: An elegant wizard hat,  in a dashing amber color scheme!

items.name: White Kitten Ears
items.description: These tiny white kitten ears were taken right off of a cute kitten.

items.name: Zerk Helm
items.description: Grrrghh!

items.name: Pie Dish
items.description: What’s cookin good lookin?

items.name: Bucket of Magic Glue
items.description: Okay,  hear me out… I know it sounds sus,  but consuming this will get you shouted out in Alien Food’s next video

items.name: Holy Crown
items.description: Holy crown? More like holy #blessed,  look at that thing!

items.name: Wooden Plank
items.description: Found this just laying around... hopefully this didn't take you 3 days to get.

items.name: Winged Helm
items.description: It’s got a name that’ll make your friends do a double-take and wonder if you just sneezed or discovered an ancient artifact,  so we shortened it for ya.

items.name: Zerk Mask
items.description: Forged in some unpronounceable ancient realm,  this mask tells the world that you're not just some ordinary pixel pusher,  but a force to be reckoned with!

items.name: Gold Spellcap
items.description: Well,  well,  well,  look who's ready to unleash their inner mage! Remember,  with great fashion comes great responsibility!

items.name: Status Skull
items.description: This bony little buddy hovers above your head like a morbid halo,  letting everyone know that you're not afraid to embrace your dark side

items.name: Feather
items.description: Totally not just bird dandruff. Mix with other junk to make stuff you probably don't need.

items.name: Gold Thread
items.description: Supposedly all the high-rollers love weaving this flashy crap into their threads to scream 'I'm loaded’. Gaudy as hell if you ask me.

items.name: Banana Hat
items.description: Feeling a bit mushy? Then this is the hat for you.

items.name: Dragon Helm
items.description: This bold crimson helmet is the perfect way to make a statement without saying a word. Slay all day!

items.name: Bowl of Soup
items.description: Keep your head warm and your tummy happy with this savory accessory! Just don't be surprised if people try to slurp your new lid.

items.name: Blue Halo
items.description: This halo is the perfect way to show off your saintly side without having to sprout wings. Just be careful,  bandits may start attacking if they see you wearing this.

items.name: Purple Flame Hat
items.description: This hat is perfect for those who want to look like they are magical without going full-on wizard

items.name: Salt & Pepper
items.description: Together,  they're an unstoppable force,  ready to tackle any gastronomic challenge. Just remember,  a little goes a long way - unless you're a fan of hypertension or sneezing fits.

items.name: Lighter
items.description: Your pocket-sized portal to the primal power of fire. Need to ignite a candle,  start a campfire,  or dramatically punctuate a point during a heated debate? This little guy has got your back.

items.name: Soup Can
items.description: A cylindrical vessel containing a mysterious liquid that may or may not be edible.

items.name: Banana
items.description: Craft it into something a-peeling.

items.name: Raw Moonstone
items.description: So our shady geological guy swears he sourced these glowing fragments "legally" during a late night mining op ...suuure,  Keith 🙄. Anyway,  keep this on the DL in case the feds start sniffing around askin' questions about missing moon matter.

items.name: Polished Moonstone
items.description: So Keith claims these smoothed-out space nuggets come "legit" too,  but the precise laser-scoring seems suspicious right? Either way,  our crafting team swears by these fragments.

items.name: Wooden Log
items.description: A specimen of nature's finest lumber,  hand-picked by our team of bark whisperers
